Phillip.Krall.SMSMailer

Class GMailSMSMailer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phillip.Krall.SMSMailer.SMSMailer
      • Phillip.Krall.SMSMailer.GMailSMSMailer

  • public class GMailSMSMailer
extends Phillip.Krall.SMSMailer.SMSMailer
    Google GMail SMS Mailer. Uses google profile to send SMS messages to users. The "From" displays as the gmail account email.
    Version:
    1.0.0 Build Sept 19, 2014
    Author:
    Phillip Krall
